description.p:
Working Group IB2 attempts to:
Evaluate the current situation concerning the adoption of e-learning by Greek organizations
Explore cases in which organizations have proceeded to an evaluation of e-learning initiatives
Identify the major problems concerning the evaluation of e-learning in the workplace
Identify international case studies and best practices concerning the evaluation of e-learning
Classify and formulate a complete approach of e-learning evaluation in the workplace.

Partners
Coordinator: Angeliki Poulymenakou, Athens University of Economics and Business
Coordinator: Nikitas Kastis, Lambrakis Foundation
Rapporteur: Panagiotis Zaharias, Athens University of Economics and Business
Rapporteur: Athanasios Nikas, Athens University of Economics and Business
